content: S-NS (M) Magnetic nut setter Nut setter with magnetic screw retention for use with hex-head screws ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Inserts- ### FEATURES:Features Magnetic nut setter for holding hexagonal-head screws Strong permanent magnet holds screws securely without wobbling Manufactured from shock-resistant tool steel selected for use with impact drivers – helps reduces the risk of premature breakage Applications ¼ hexagon connection end for use with all common holders (DIN ISO 1173-F 6.3) Suitable for use with cordless universal screwdrivers and impact drivers Nut setter for use with hexagonal head screws, e.g. metal construction screws and self-drilling screws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: 1/4 in Hex shank Technical Data | Connection end | 1/4 in Hex shank ### ITEMS- 2039230 - Magnetic nut setter 1/4 x 2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2045996 - Magnetic nut setter 1/2 x 2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2039232 - Magnetic nut setter 3/8 x 2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2039234 - Magnetic nut setter 3/8 x 2-1/2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2039231 - Magnetic nut setter 5/16 x 2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2039233 - Magnetic nut setter 5/16 x 2-1/2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2045966 - Nut setter FCP Disc - Package Size 1 pc
tag_description: Nut setter with magnetic screw retention for use with hex-head screws
